title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Formative Assessment-Based Teaching Competency Diagnosis and Improvement Strategies

context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Acquire proficiency in using diagnostic tools for teaching competencies based on four quality dimensions per subject (organization, assessment methods, interaction, academic rigor)
Develop the ability to interpret student feedback based on item response theory
Strengthen the capacity to analyze assessment results considering external variables such as gender and emotional factors
Develop the ability to create personalized teaching improvement plans based on diagnostic results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
